trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a transaction to be performed at a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxx$ xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the Connection object to associate with the transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The Connection object to associate with the transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

-or-

The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

-or-

The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.
